body: {'What do you like best?': 'I love the powerful, flexible nature of this CRM. It is very intuitive and easy to learn. Very extensive reporting capabilities as well as the ability the add third-party add-ons. It is the most popular solution in the market, and a reasonable price. Their support is also very good, they contact you back very quickly.', 'What do you dislike?': "Can get too detailed sometimes if you don't know what you are doing. Needs a little hand holding at first to get new users started.", 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Keep track of all of our customers and their opportunities. Everything that is discussed or email is tracked. We can track customers/contacts, different locations, products they have purchased, support ticketing and even set marketing reminders.'}
category: [{'category': 'Sales Force Automation', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Contact & Account Management', 'description': 'Store and retrieve information associated to customer contacts and accounts.  Track company-wide communication and information about contacts and accounts.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '6635'}, {'title': 'Partner Relationship Mgmt. (PRM)', 'description': 'Manage partners by tracking channel partner leads and sales opportunities.   Provide a partner portal to collaborate with channels on sales opportunities and to share product, pricing, quoting, ordering, and training information', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '4056'}, {'title': 'Opportunity & Pipeline Mgmt.', 'description': 'Manage sales opportunities through their lifecycle from lead to order. Track stages, values, and probabilities of close.  Manage sales pipelines by individual sales rep, team, region, and company-wide.', 'percentage': '86%', 'based_on_reviews': '6369'}, {'title': 'Task / Activity Management', 'description': 'Manage and track tasks and activities.  Assign due dates and integrate to calendars to manage daily schedules and priorities.', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '6620'}, {'title': 'Territory & Quota Management', 'description': 'Assign and manage sales quotas and territories.  Track progress against quotas.  Change as needed.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '4844'}, {'title': 'Desktop Integration', 'description': 'Allows users to sync their Email, Calendar and Contact tools with their CRM system.  Includes Microsoft Outlook and Google integration.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '5099'}, {'title': 'Product & Price List Management', 'description': 'Enter product/part numbers and manage the prices associated with them.  Typically functionality allows users to add products and prices to opportunities and quotes if these modules are provided within the same system.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '4339'}, {'title': 'Quote & Order Management', 'description': 'Allows users to create a quote to be provided to a customer that contain at least products, prices and associated discounts.  Order management allows users to process orders that contain products, prices and associated discounts.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '4274'}, {'title': 'Customer Contract Management', 'description': 'Management of contracts made with customers.  Contract management includes negotiating the terms and conditions in contracts and ensuring compliance with the terms and conditions, as well as documenting and agreeing on any changes or amendments that may arise during its implementation or execution.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '4925'}]}, {'category': 'Marketing Automation', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Email Marketing', 'description': 'Allows users to send email to contacts in bulk.  Common features include: Built in Email templates, social media integration, Subscriber list management, sign up forms, success rate reports, AB testing and auto-responders.', 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '4269'}, {'title': 'Campaign Management', 'description': 'Optimizes the process for organizations to develop and deploy multiple-channel marketing campaigns to target groups or individuals and track the effect of those campaigns, by customer segment, over time.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '4570'}, {'title': 'Lead Management', 'description': 'Allows users to manage and track leads though a process.  The lead process typically involves steps such as:  1. Lead Generation, 2. Customer Inquiry, Inquiry Capture, Lead Filtering, Lead Grading, Lead Distribution and Lead Qualification.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '5395'}, {'title': 'Marketing ROI Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of effectiveness of an organizations various marketing activities', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3669'}]}, {'category': 'Customer Support', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Case Management', 'description': 'Tracks issues/help requests reported by customers through the resolution process.', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '4313'}, {'title': 'Customer Support Portal', 'description': 'Provides a convenient way for customers to get answers to inquiries, post service issues, place orders, view order histories, and gain access to other information contained in the knowledge base.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '3973'}, {'title': 'Knowledge Base', 'description': 'Information repository that provides a means for information to be collected, organized, shared, searched and utilized.  Allows customers to get answers to common questions.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4266'}, {'title': 'Call Center Features', 'description': 'Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity.  Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3267'}, {'title': 'Support Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '3632'}]}, {'category': 'Reporting & Analytics', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Reporting', 'description': 'Enables reporting of all data contained within the system.  Typically contains standard reports as well as the ability to create ad-hoc reports.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6200'}, {'title': 'Dashboards', 'description': 'An easy to read, often single page, real-time user interface, showing a graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of an organization’s Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable instantaneous and informed decisions to be made at a glance', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6355'}, {'title': 'Forecasting', 'description': "Enables projection of sales revenue, based on historical sales data, analysis of market surveys and trends, and salespersons' estimates.", 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4982'}]}, {'category': 'Mobile & Social', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Social Collaboration Features', 'description': "Enables multiple users to interact by sharing information to achieve a common goal.  Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone", 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '3465'}, {'title': 'Social Network Integration', 'description': 'Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers.  Allows users to filter what’s important and respond quickly.  Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.', 'percentage': '77%', 'based_on_reviews': '3134'}, {'title': 'Mobile User Support', 'description': 'Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.', 'percentage': '76%', 'based_on_reviews': '3851'}]}, {'category': 'Platform', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Customization', 'description': 'Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1678'}, {'title': 'Workflow Capability', 'description': 'Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1694'}, {'title': 'User, Role, and Access Management', 'description': 'Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.', 'percentage': '85%', 'based_on_reviews': '1691'}, {'title': 'Internationalization', 'description': 'Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1153'}, {'title': 'Sandbox / Test Environments', 'description': 'Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': 'It is really easy to use, intuitive with several functionalities', 'What do you dislike?': 'I think license cost is important and not easy to afford for little companies', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Salesforce is a complete CRM software'}

The functionality to generate in-depth reports gives a clear understanding of the business development process. I would recommend Salesforce CRM for every business', 'What do you dislike?': 'The Salesforce lightning version is not user-friendly.', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'Go for it!', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Database ManagementLead GenerationMarketing Funnel'}

Allows customers to get answers to common questions.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4266'}, {'title': 'Call Center Features', 'description': 'Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity.  Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3267'}, {'title': 'Support Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '3632'}]}, {'category': 'Reporting & Analytics', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Reporting', 'description': 'Enables reporting of all data contained within the system.  Typically contains standard reports as well as the ability to create ad-hoc reports.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6200'}, {'title': 'Dashboards', 'description': 'An easy to read, often single page, real-time user interface, showing a graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of an organization’s Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable instantaneous and informed decisions to be made at a glance', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6355'}, {'title': 'Forecasting', 'description': "Enables projection of sales revenue, based on historical sales data, analysis of market surveys and trends, and salespersons' estimates.", 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4982'}]}, {'category': 'Mobile & Social', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Social Collaboration Features', 'description': "Enables multiple users to interact by sharing information to achieve a common goal.  Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone", 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '3465'}, {'title': 'Social Network Integration', 'description': 'Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers.  Allows users to filter what’s important and respond quickly.  Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.', 'percentage': '77%', 'based_on_reviews': '3134'}, {'title': 'Mobile User Support', 'description': 'Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.', 'percentage': '76%', 'based_on_reviews': '3851'}]}, {'category': 'Platform', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Customization', 'description': 'Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1678'}, {'title': 'Workflow Capability', 'description': 'Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1694'}, {'title': 'User, Role, and Access Management', 'description': 'Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.', 'percentage': '85%', 'based_on_reviews': '1691'}, {'title': 'Internationalization', 'description': 'Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1153'}, {'title': 'Sandbox / Test Environments', 'description': 'Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': 'The tool works so effortfully across multiple teams to store and share communications freely without duplicating or spending time recreating. A colleague can access the client profile and see all recorded conversation without missing a beat.', 'What do you dislike?': 'The email capacity can be reached with multiple communications strings but not a huge issue.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'I have been receiving an errors when making updates but typically the information is not lost.'}

Allows customers to get answers to common questions.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4266'}, {'title': 'Call Center Features', 'description': 'Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity.  Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3267'}, {'title': 'Support Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '3632'}]}, {'category': 'Reporting & Analytics', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Reporting', 'description': 'Enables reporting of all data contained within the system.  Typically contains standard reports as well as the ability to create ad-hoc reports.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6200'}, {'title': 'Dashboards', 'description': 'An easy to read, often single page, real-time user interface, showing a graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of an organization’s Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable instantaneous and informed decisions to be made at a glance', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6355'}, {'title': 'Forecasting', 'description': "Enables projection of sales revenue, based on historical sales data, analysis of market surveys and trends, and salespersons' estimates.", 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4982'}]}, {'category': 'Mobile & Social', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Social Collaboration Features', 'description': "Enables multiple users to interact by sharing information to achieve a common goal.  Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone", 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '3465'}, {'title': 'Social Network Integration', 'description': 'Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers.  Allows users to filter what’s important and respond quickly.  Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.', 'percentage': '77%', 'based_on_reviews': '3134'}, {'title': 'Mobile User Support', 'description': 'Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.', 'percentage': '76%', 'based_on_reviews': '3851'}]}, {'category': 'Platform', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Customization', 'description': 'Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1678'}, {'title': 'Workflow Capability', 'description': 'Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1694'}, {'title': 'User, Role, and Access Management', 'description': 'Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.', 'percentage': '85%', 'based_on_reviews': '1691'}, {'title': 'Internationalization', 'description': 'Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1153'}, {'title': 'Sandbox / Test Environments', 'description': 'Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': 'We literally run our whole system through salesforce. I like that it is easy to navigate once you learn how to use the system', 'What do you dislike?': "It crashes a lot and we have to logout and change our password, but that doesn't happen all the time", 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Problems are the glitch occasionally, but benefits overall is that it allows for us to use the system in a very smooth way!'}

body: {'What do you like best?': 'This is an excellent platform - great to track a sale from point zero to on-going support afterward.  the great thing is having the ability to access the information from anywhere at any time. again this is great to track a sale since you will have all the information about the product/service sold, how sold it, who bought it and everything. you can adjust what information you want to show divided by the departments that will interact with it.', 'What do you dislike?': "it is a bit hard for users, it takes certain skills to get it set up and to custom it to company's needs.", 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'all of them, you can easily have access to all the information of the account, you can interact with other members via chatter, send emails, etc.. you can track all interactions, assing workload, manage accounts.it can be integrated with all types of software.'}

Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone", 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '3465'}, {'title': 'Social Network Integration', 'description': 'Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers.  Allows users to filter what’s important and respond quickly.  Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.', 'percentage': '77%', 'based_on_reviews': '3134'}, {'title': 'Mobile User Support', 'description': 'Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.', 'percentage': '76%', 'based_on_reviews': '3851'}]}, {'category': 'Platform', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Customization', 'description': 'Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1678'}, {'title': 'Workflow Capability', 'description': 'Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users. Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1694'}, {'title': 'User, Role, and Access Management', 'description': 'Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.', 'percentage': '85%', 'based_on_reviews': '1691'}, {'title': 'Internationalization', 'description': 'Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1153'}, {'title': 'Sandbox / Test Environments', 'description': 'Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': 'It gives control back to the administrators and requires little coding beyond excel like formulas to give a dynamic feel to the system.', 'What do you dislike?': 'A well built org doesn’t need much custom development, but it’s easy to fall into the trap of thinking you need custom development. When you do fall into the Apex world, it’s a terrible stripped down version of Java.', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'It’s expensive but probably the best CRM if you want to put the power to make change in the hands of your administrators', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Customer services mostly. Also lead/order tracking'}

name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': 'Salesforce allows me to have everything for my business set in one program. I am able to add notes for co workers to see, update files, send out emails, and even can send documents through docusign for clients to sign.Another thing i love about Salesforce is that I am able to set tasks for my employees and I am able to track whether they have or have not fulfilled those tasks. Salesforce can easily be used to create word documents and is mobile friendly.', 'What do you dislike?': 'It is hard to learn how to use Salesforce to its extent. It took me a while to understand and learn my way around the software.There is also a lot going on with Salesforce and can sometimes becoming overwhelming to use.', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'You will not regret making this choice. Salesforce has simplified my day to day work and has allowed me to get more done in less amount of time', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'I used to use another program that would only allow me to create customer files and place notes, Salesforce allows me to do much more, including uploading files and letting me know when changes were made to the file and what those changes were. Salesfoce can also be programmed for many different uses. My company is always updating the software to allow us to do everything we could need for our company, no matter how big or small it is.'}

Allows customers to get answers to common questions.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4266'}, {'title': 'Call Center Features', 'description': 'Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity.  Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3267'}, {'title': 'Support Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '3632'}]}, {'category': 'Reporting & Analytics', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Reporting', 'description': 'Enables reporting of all data contained within the system.  Typically contains standard reports as well as the ability to create ad-hoc reports.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6200'}, {'title': 'Dashboards', 'description': 'An easy to read, often single page, real-time user interface, showing a graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of an organization’s Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable instantaneous and informed decisions to be made at a glance', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6355'}, {'title': 'Forecasting', 'description': "Enables projection of sales revenue, based on historical sales data, analysis of market surveys and trends, and salespersons' estimates.", 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4982'}]}, {'category': 'Mobile & Social', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Social Collaboration Features', 'description': "Enables multiple users to interact by sharing information to achieve a common goal.  Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone", 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '3465'}, {'title': 'Social Network Integration', 'description': 'Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers.  Allows users to filter what’s important and respond quickly.  Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.', 'percentage': '77%', 'based_on_reviews': '3134'}, {'title': 'Mobile User Support', 'description': 'Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.', 'percentage': '76%', 'based_on_reviews': '3851'}]}, {'category': 'Platform', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Customization', 'description': 'Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1678'}, {'title': 'Workflow Capability', 'description': 'Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1694'}, {'title': 'User, Role, and Access Management', 'description': 'Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.', 'percentage': '85%', 'based_on_reviews': '1691'}, {'title': 'Internationalization', 'description': 'Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1153'}, {'title': 'Sandbox / Test Environments', 'description': 'Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': 'Easy to use and intuitive. Lots of help and tutorial material available online and by Salesforce. Has great performance due to the governance limit imposed on every tenant', 'What do you dislike?': 'Nothing so far to dislike and because of its ample help available online and active forum any difficulty or questions we have are solved soon', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': '1) Very easy to manager Accounts, Leads and Opportunities. Most of the work is done of the Salesforce CRM itself\r2)  Super easy point and click process builder and workflow creations\r3) Comprehensive study material available', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'One part of my email workflow to send email to customers when they finish their retail order is setup on salesforce.\r It is very intuitive CRM with most functions performed by point and click and very less maintenance. The Version upgrades and all dependency upgrade is managed by Salesforce itself . Also it has marvelous help and tutorial available online and by Salesforce itself.'}

You can customize the same as per your requirement.Also, it is really useful for Managers to generate reports easily.', 'What do you dislike?': "Didn't find any such cons but it is just that it is so huge and contains so many options. it takes a while to understand the most about it.", 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'This tool does help the customers to raise their queries towards the usage of our product.'}

name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management

body: {'What do you like best?': 'I like that salesforce makes an effort to prevent overlaps and dual entries in data. It also tracks data well from long and far.', 'What do you dislike?': 'This platform could be less clunky and more icon driven. The methods required to make certain searches can also be counter-intuitive. It would be nice if it took little training and one could intuitively navigate. Also, it seems  that when integrating other tools, salesforce can incorrectly merge data.', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'Train your team best practices. This kind of messy data is a user issue, not a manufacturer issue.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Salesforce allows you to follow the history of each account, contact, and opportunity in detail. If used correctly, the tool provides a very comprehensive view of each. Still, this is in several panes of glass, and it would be nice if it were in one alone.'}

Contract management includes negotiating the terms and conditions in contracts and ensuring compliance with the terms and conditions, as well as documenting and agreeing on any changes or amendments that may arise during its implementation or execution.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '4925'}]}, {'category': 'Marketing Automation', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Email Marketing', 'description': 'Allows users to send email to contacts in bulk.  Common features include: Built in Email templates, social media integration, Subscriber list management, sign up forms, success rate reports, AB testing and auto-responders.', 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '4269'}, {'title': 'Campaign Management', 'description': 'Optimizes the process for organizations to develop and deploy multiple-channel marketing campaigns to target groups or individuals and track the effect of those campaigns, by customer segment, over time.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '4570'}, {'title': 'Lead Management', 'description': 'Allows users to manage and track leads though a process.  The lead process typically involves steps such as:  1. Lead Generation, 2. Customer Inquiry, Inquiry Capture, Lead Filtering, Lead Grading, Lead Distribution and Lead Qualification.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '5395'}, {'title': 'Marketing ROI Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of effectiveness of an organizations various marketing activities', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3669'}]}, {'category': 'Customer Support', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Case Management', 'description': 'Tracks issues/help requests reported by customers through the resolution process.', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '4313'}, {'title': 'Customer Support Portal', 'description': 'Provides a convenient way for customers to get answers to inquiries, post service issues, place orders, view order histories, and gain access to other information contained in the knowledge base.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '3973'}, {'title': 'Knowledge Base', 'description': 'Information repository that provides a means for information to be collected, organized, shared, searched and utilized.  Allows customers to get answers to common questions.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4266'}, {'title': 'Call Center Features', 'description': 'Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity.  Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3267'}, {'title': 'Support Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '3632'}]}, {'category': 'Reporting & Analytics', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Reporting', 'description': 'Enables reporting of all data contained within the system.  Typically contains standard reports as well as the ability to create ad-hoc reports.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6200'}, {'title': 'Dashboards', 'description': 'An easy to read, often single page, real-time user interface, showing a graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of an organization’s Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable instantaneous and informed decisions to be made at a glance', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6355'}, {'title': 'Forecasting', 'description': "Enables projection of sales revenue, based on historical sales data, analysis of market surveys and trends, and salespersons' estimates.", 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4982'}]}, {'category': 'Mobile & Social', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Social Collaboration Features', 'description': "Enables multiple users to interact by sharing information to achieve a common goal.  Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone", 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '3465'}, {'title': 'Social Network Integration', 'description': 'Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers.  Allows users to filter what’s important and respond quickly.  Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.', 'percentage': '77%', 'based_on_reviews': '3134'}, {'title': 'Mobile User Support', 'description': 'Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.', 'percentage': '76%', 'based_on_reviews': '3851'}]}, {'category': 'Platform', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Customization', 'description': 'Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1678'}, {'title': 'Workflow Capability', 'description': 'Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1694'}, {'title': 'User, Role, and Access Management', 'description': 'Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.', 'percentage': '85%', 'based_on_reviews': '1691'}, {'title': 'Internationalization', 'description': 'Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1153'}, {'title': 'Sandbox / Test Environments', 'description': 'Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

Customer Inquiry, Inquiry Capture, Lead Filtering, Lead Grading, Lead Distribution and Lead Qualification.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '5395'}, {'title': 'Marketing ROI Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of effectiveness of an organizations various marketing activities', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3669'}]}, {'category': 'Customer Support', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Case Management', 'description': 'Tracks issues/help requests reported by customers through the resolution process.', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '4313'}, {'title': 'Customer Support Portal', 'description': 'Provides a convenient way for customers to get answers to inquiries, post service issues, place orders, view order histories, and gain access to other information contained in the knowledge base.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '3973'}, {'title': 'Knowledge Base', 'description': 'Information repository that provides a means for information to be collected, organized, shared, searched and utilized.  Allows customers to get answers to common questions.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4266'}, {'title': 'Call Center Features', 'description': 'Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity.  Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3267'}, {'title': 'Support Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '3632'}]}, {'category': 'Reporting & Analytics', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Reporting', 'description': 'Enables reporting of all data contained within the system.  Typically contains standard reports as well as the ability to create ad-hoc reports.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6200'}, {'title': 'Dashboards', 'description': 'An easy to read, often single page, real-time user interface, showing a graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of an organization’s Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable instantaneous and informed decisions to be made at a glance', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6355'}, {'title': 'Forecasting', 'description': "Enables projection of sales revenue, based on historical sales data, analysis of market surveys and trends, and salespersons' estimates.", 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4982'}]}, {'category': 'Mobile & Social', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Social Collaboration Features', 'description': "Enables multiple users to interact by sharing information to achieve a common goal.  Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone", 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '3465'}, {'title': 'Social Network Integration', 'description': 'Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers.  Allows users to filter what’s important and respond quickly.  Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.', 'percentage': '77%', 'based_on_reviews': '3134'}, {'title': 'Mobile User Support', 'description': 'Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.', 'percentage': '76%', 'based_on_reviews': '3851'}]}, {'category': 'Platform', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Customization', 'description': 'Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1678'}, {'title': 'Workflow Capability', 'description': 'Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1694'}, {'title': 'User, Role, and Access Management', 'description': 'Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.', 'percentage': '85%', 'based_on_reviews': '1691'}, {'title': 'Internationalization', 'description': 'Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1153'}, {'title': 'Sandbox / Test Environments', 'description': 'Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': 'Handling clients reports and data is very easy and very interactive report to show your data and analysis work. Dashboard is very systematic and easy to navigate other featured  tasks.', 'What do you dislike?': 'Some features are very complex and you can read some tutorials  to understand the features, but overall it easy to use. And sometimes it takes too much time to fetch the reporting.', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'I recommend to all users which are manage their clients.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'I have handle all my clients and reporting data by this tool.'}

name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': 'Salesforce CRM is the most robust CRM out there. It has every feature and capability within a CRM that you could expect and more, making it the go-to CRM. It integrates perfectly with tons of 3rd party applications and services. The customer support is great and can help with almost any issue imaginable. All of the staff is very knowledgeable about the product.', 'What do you dislike?': 'The price of Salesforce CRM is a bit steep, but sort of understandable due to the vast amount of features. However, I would like if more plans were offered with more limited features and of course a lesser cost in order to cater towards small businesses.', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'If you can afford the steep price tag and need a CRM, Salesforce should be your choice.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'being able to keep track of our sales pipeline and customer relationships in one place.'}

Customer Inquiry, Inquiry Capture, Lead Filtering, Lead Grading, Lead Distribution and Lead Qualification.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '5395'}, {'title': 'Marketing ROI Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of effectiveness of an organizations various marketing activities', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3669'}]}, {'category': 'Customer Support', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Case Management', 'description': 'Tracks issues/help requests reported by customers through the resolution process.', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '4313'}, {'title': 'Customer Support Portal', 'description': 'Provides a convenient way for customers to get answers to inquiries, post service issues, place orders, view order histories, and gain access to other information contained in the knowledge base.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '3973'}, {'title': 'Knowledge Base', 'description': 'Information repository that provides a means for information to be collected, organized, shared, searched and utilized.  Allows customers to get answers to common questions.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4266'}, {'title': 'Call Center Features', 'description': 'Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity.  Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3267'}, {'title': 'Support Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '3632'}]}, {'category': 'Reporting & Analytics', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Reporting', 'description': 'Enables reporting of all data contained within the system.  Typically contains standard reports as well as the ability to create ad-hoc reports.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6200'}, {'title': 'Dashboards', 'description': 'An easy to read, often single page, real-time user interface, showing a graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of an organization’s Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable instantaneous and informed decisions to be made at a glance', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6355'}, {'title': 'Forecasting', 'description': "Enables projection of sales revenue, based on historical sales data, analysis of market surveys and trends, and salespersons' estimates.", 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4982'}]}, {'category': 'Mobile & Social', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Social Collaboration Features', 'description': "Enables multiple users to interact by sharing information to achieve a common goal.  Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone", 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '3465'}, {'title': 'Social Network Integration', 'description': 'Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers.  Allows users to filter what’s important and respond quickly.  Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.', 'percentage': '77%', 'based_on_reviews': '3134'}, {'title': 'Mobile User Support', 'description': 'Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.', 'percentage': '76%', 'based_on_reviews': '3851'}]}, {'category': 'Platform', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Customization', 'description': 'Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1678'}, {'title': 'Workflow Capability', 'description': 'Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1694'}, {'title': 'User, Role, and Access Management', 'description': 'Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.', 'percentage': '85%', 'based_on_reviews': '1691'}, {'title': 'Internationalization', 'description': 'Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1153'}, {'title': 'Sandbox / Test Environments', 'description': 'Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': 'It is almost endlessly configurable, a blessing and a disadvantage. You can either remove the standard from the box configuration and work with it, or use custom fields, allowances, profiles and code to extend it.', 'What do you dislike?': 'Due to the complexity that you may have, you may need a professional to tell you when you go far enough, or not automate enough.', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'Consult with an experienced partner and have a detailed plan for implementation and adoption, including ongoing training.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Salesforce enabled us to track all important data in a single place, enabling us to develop solutions that give our customers genuine value, enabled us to prepare, manage, evaluate, qualify and transform our business, and enableed our partners to improve ties with their suppliers through their more simple co-operation with joint sales and the marketing sector.'}

Customer Inquiry, Inquiry Capture, Lead Filtering, Lead Grading, Lead Distribution and Lead Qualification.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '5395'}, {'title': 'Marketing ROI Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of effectiveness of an organizations various marketing activities', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3669'}]}, {'category': 'Customer Support', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Case Management', 'description': 'Tracks issues/help requests reported by customers through the resolution process.', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '4313'}, {'title': 'Customer Support Portal', 'description': 'Provides a convenient way for customers to get answers to inquiries, post service issues, place orders, view order histories, and gain access to other information contained in the knowledge base.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '3973'}, {'title': 'Knowledge Base', 'description': 'Information repository that provides a means for information to be collected, organized, shared, searched and utilized.  Allows customers to get answers to common questions.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4266'}, {'title': 'Call Center Features', 'description': 'Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity.  Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3267'}, {'title': 'Support Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '3632'}]}, {'category': 'Reporting & Analytics', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Reporting', 'description': 'Enables reporting of all data contained within the system.  Typically contains standard reports as well as the ability to create ad-hoc reports.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6200'}, {'title': 'Dashboards', 'description': 'An easy to read, often single page, real-time user interface, showing a graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of an organization’s Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable instantaneous and informed decisions to be made at a glance', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6355'}, {'title': 'Forecasting', 'description': "Enables projection of sales revenue, based on historical sales data, analysis of market surveys and trends, and salespersons' estimates.", 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4982'}]}, {'category': 'Mobile & Social', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Social Collaboration Features', 'description': "Enables multiple users to interact by sharing information to achieve a common goal.  Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone", 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '3465'}, {'title': 'Social Network Integration', 'description': 'Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers.  Allows users to filter what’s important and respond quickly.  Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.', 'percentage': '77%', 'based_on_reviews': '3134'}, {'title': 'Mobile User Support', 'description': 'Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.', 'percentage': '76%', 'based_on_reviews': '3851'}]}, {'category': 'Platform', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Customization', 'description': 'Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1678'}, {'title': 'Workflow Capability', 'description': 'Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1694'}, {'title': 'User, Role, and Access Management', 'description': 'Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.', 'percentage': '85%', 'based_on_reviews': '1691'}, {'title': 'Internationalization', 'description': 'Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1153'}, {'title': 'Sandbox / Test Environments', 'description': 'Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': 'Salesforce is very customizable for every business need. I check my open tasks everyday and that helps me stay on task at work. I can also see what others are doing by the task report so I can make sure they are on task as well.', 'What do you dislike?': "The only thing that I dislike is the difficulty in the initial building of the crm. It can be quite a daunting task if you've never used it before.", 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'Salesforce has different "experiences" based on what you prefer. I prefer the classic mode as it\'s much easier to navigate. It\'s a fantastic tool to organize all your customers and tasks for your business.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Salesforce help my business organize information for easy access.'}

Easy to track the history', 'What do you dislike?': 'I could not find export to excel or google sheet option. What benefits have you realized?': 'Management of Salesforce requests between multiple teams.Passing the requests to different teams with updates, saves time for  management'}
