After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': 'This is too good CRM for customer handling purpose. It provides all in one services in a single dashboard. Sales graph shows the process of sales the company. New lead generation can be do here and also get their updated on it too. Report fetching, calendar, notes making, email Listing, accounts and contact add are the some of the important features which make so easy to handle Customers and related to their queries.', 'What do you dislike?': 'It is full package for CRM except of that it is not completely free for use.', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'This is excellent in features. With single dashboard many features can be used here which make easy to handle customers. New contacts can be added here. email listing is also possible which is too good.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Salesforce CRM helped our company a lot as it provides all in one features in a single software. Our company employees now easily handled all the Customers. All the escalations are handled on time which increase the productivity of our company. Lead generation became easy and fast with the helped of this software. Trial period of 30 days helped our company employees to get know the features of this software. It is robust in use'}

body: {'What do you like best?': 'Salesforce CRM is the industry standard for CRMs. It has every feature imaginable and integrates all of the industry standard software. Most people will probably not even use close to all of the features offered within Salesforce, but it still is one of the best CRMs.', 'What do you dislike?': 'The price of Salesforce is very expensive, thus making it more difficult for small businesses to use this software.', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'Consider using Salesforce CRM if you have the money as it is the industry standard for CRMs and sales pipeline management.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Being able to keep track of sales prospects and pipelines, as well as manage current client relationships.'}

body: {'What do you like best?': 'Advanced work requires advanced work tools, which can also meet complex management agendas, as part of a good business relationship between customers and companies. It is an approach that must be given from the first functions to cover greater expectations and goals of greater scope. SalesForce has the growth capacity that every growing company needs. It is part of the challenge. And SalesForce adds more achievements over time.', 'What do you dislike?': 'CRMs are usually that dynamic option for the sales departments of a company. And they really energize, because it makes all the staff make an extra effort to make the load roll. And also it is necessary who pushes it downhill. In other words, there is a need for technical support personnel to move the business management initiative in the indicated direction. SalesForce is the cart that carries everything, but alone it cannot without horses and coachmen.', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'The web base is key in business management work. And with SalesForce this is well regarded as one of the best developed internal tools. It is so to such an extent that SalesForce allows quite freely the customization of the web base. This leads to a more methodical work that aims to achieve a greater impact on the strategies designed with the support in SalesForce. With this advantage, work during management and the new relationship with customers will be simplified.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'The customer usually looks like a problem and only ceases to be a problem when he makes the respective business contribution to the company in question. Fortunately that is something SalesForce has taken into account since its creation. Hence, it has very complete tools for proper customer service. The client will feel it and with that client feeling good you can have a good link for future and better negotiations. SalesForce pushes the company that wants to grow.'}

Order management allows users to process orders that contain products, prices and associated discounts.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '4274'}, {'title': 'Customer Contract Management', 'description': 'Management of contracts made with customers.  Contract management includes negotiating the terms and conditions in contracts and ensuring compliance with the terms and conditions, as well as documenting and agreeing on any changes or amendments that may arise during its implementation or execution.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '4925'}]}, {'category': 'Marketing Automation', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Email Marketing', 'description': 'Allows users to send email to contacts in bulk.  Common features include: Built in Email templates, social media integration, Subscriber list management, sign up forms, success rate reports, AB testing and auto-responders.', 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '4269'}, {'title': 'Campaign Management', 'description': 'Optimizes the process for organizations to develop and deploy multiple-channel marketing campaigns to target groups or individuals and track the effect of those campaigns, by customer segment, over time.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '4570'}, {'title': 'Lead Management', 'description': 'Allows users to manage and track leads though a process.  The lead process typically involves steps such as:  1. Lead Generation, 2. Customer Inquiry, Inquiry Capture, Lead Filtering, Lead Grading, Lead Distribution and Lead Qualification.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '5395'}, {'title': 'Marketing ROI Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of effectiveness of an organizations various marketing activities', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3669'}]}, {'category': 'Customer Support', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Case Management', 'description': 'Tracks issues/help requests reported by customers through the resolution process.', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '4313'}, {'title': 'Customer Support Portal', 'description': 'Provides a convenient way for customers to get answers to inquiries, post service issues, place orders, view order histories, and gain access to other information contained in the knowledge base.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '3973'}, {'title': 'Knowledge Base', 'description': 'Information repository that provides a means for information to be collected, organized, shared, searched and utilized.  Allows customers to get answers to common questions.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4266'}, {'title': 'Call Center Features', 'description': 'Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity.  Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3267'}, {'title': 'Support Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '3632'}]}, {'category': 'Reporting & Analytics', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Reporting', 'description': 'Enables reporting of all data contained within the system.  Typically contains standard reports as well as the ability to create ad-hoc reports.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6200'}, {'title': 'Dashboards', 'description': 'An easy to read, often single page, real-time user interface, showing a graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of an organization’s Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable instantaneous and informed decisions to be made at a glance', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6355'}, {'title': 'Forecasting', 'description': "Enables projection of sales revenue, based on historical sales data, analysis of market surveys and trends, and salespersons' estimates.", 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4982'}]}, {'category': 'Mobile & Social', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Social Collaboration Features', 'description': "Enables multiple users to interact by sharing information to achieve a common goal.  Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone", 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '3465'}, {'title': 'Social Network Integration', 'description': 'Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers.  Allows users to filter what’s important and respond quickly.  Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.', 'percentage': '77%', 'based_on_reviews': '3134'}, {'title': 'Mobile User Support', 'description': 'Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.', 'percentage': '76%', 'based_on_reviews': '3851'}]}, {'category': 'Platform', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Customization', 'description': 'Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1678'}, {'title': 'Workflow Capability', 'description': 'Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1694'}, {'title': 'User, Role, and Access Management', 'description': 'Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.', 'percentage': '85%', 'based_on_reviews': '1691'}, {'title': 'Internationalization', 'description': 'Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1153'}, {'title': 'Sandbox / Test Environments', 'description': 'Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': 'The ability to keep track of customer base and track sales and reports in real time.', 'What do you dislike?': 'Can be cumbersome to input information and get consistent implementation from staff.', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'Continue to offer content and webinars on how to better adapt and implement Salesforce company wide. Make some data entry more user friendly and cetnralized.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Tracking our customer database and keep tracking of our subscription information. It has helped better keep track of memberships, target new propspects, and share relevant information to key shareholders.'}

And integration under the view of a CRM is a comprehensive way, especially when part of wanting to achieve better management between the company and its customers. SalesForce always sees and goes beyond that, so it is seen as the leading CRM market.', 'What do you dislike?': 'All good work, broad as that aspires to be with CRM involves proper configuration. This in the case of SalesForce undoubtedly represents an extra workload. The message is clear. If you wanted to work beyond a simple marketing campaign manager you must wear high boots and get into the mud to both internal and external work. SalesForce is made for a complex configuration that would be good to avoid or simplify. Is it possible?', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'If you wanted a CRM where the customer was the protagonist (and not the program or the company) will on target with SalesForce. And with this platform enterprise management it takes into account the client with all your needs. From the point of view of the implementation of the program with SalesForce it is you can easily track customers to meet the customer needs and improve customer relations. Do you want more? Become a SalesForce customer.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'In the most options when it takes SalesForce at the gates of a company already you have a visitor. Is almost always the company is already using other tools or applications, which was precisely what led her to think about using a CRM. But SalesForce had already anticipated this because it was created with the ability to seamlessly integrate with other software to work with them. SalesForce get companies to take the lead.'}

Contract management includes negotiating the terms and conditions in contracts and ensuring compliance with the terms and conditions, as well as documenting and agreeing on any changes or amendments that may arise during its implementation or execution.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '4925'}]}, {'category': 'Marketing Automation', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Email Marketing', 'description': 'Allows users to send email to contacts in bulk.  Common features include: Built in Email templates, social media integration, Subscriber list management, sign up forms, success rate reports, AB testing and auto-responders.', 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '4269'}, {'title': 'Campaign Management', 'description': 'Optimizes the process for organizations to develop and deploy multiple-channel marketing campaigns to target groups or individuals and track the effect of those campaigns, by customer segment, over time.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '4570'}, {'title': 'Lead Management', 'description': 'Allows users to manage and track leads though a process.  The lead process typically involves steps such as:  1. Lead Generation, 2. Customer Inquiry, Inquiry Capture, Lead Filtering, Lead Grading, Lead Distribution and Lead Qualification.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '5395'}, {'title': 'Marketing ROI Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of effectiveness of an organizations various marketing activities', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3669'}]}, {'category': 'Customer Support', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Case Management', 'description': 'Tracks issues/help requests reported by customers through the resolution process.', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '4313'}, {'title': 'Customer Support Portal', 'description': 'Provides a convenient way for customers to get answers to inquiries, post service issues, place orders, view order histories, and gain access to other information contained in the knowledge base.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '3973'}, {'title': 'Knowledge Base', 'description': 'Information repository that provides a means for information to be collected, organized, shared, searched and utilized.  Allows customers to get answers to common questions.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4266'}, {'title': 'Call Center Features', 'description': 'Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity.  Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3267'}, {'title': 'Support Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '3632'}]}, {'category': 'Reporting & Analytics', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Reporting', 'description': 'Enables reporting of all data contained within the system.  Typically contains standard reports as well as the ability to create ad-hoc reports.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6200'}, {'title': 'Dashboards', 'description': 'An easy to read, often single page, real-time user interface, showing a graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of an organization’s Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable instantaneous and informed decisions to be made at a glance', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6355'}, {'title': 'Forecasting', 'description': "Enables projection of sales revenue, based on historical sales data, analysis of market surveys and trends, and salespersons' estimates.", 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4982'}]}, {'category': 'Mobile & Social', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Social Collaboration Features', 'description': "Enables multiple users to interact by sharing information to achieve a common goal.  Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone", 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '3465'}, {'title': 'Social Network Integration', 'description': 'Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers.  Allows users to filter what’s important and respond quickly.  Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.', 'percentage': '77%', 'based_on_reviews': '3134'}, {'title': 'Mobile User Support', 'description': 'Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.', 'percentage': '76%', 'based_on_reviews': '3851'}]}, {'category': 'Platform', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Customization', 'description': 'Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1678'}, {'title': 'Workflow Capability', 'description': 'Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1694'}, {'title': 'User, Role, and Access Management', 'description': 'Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.', 'percentage': '85%', 'based_on_reviews': '1691'}, {'title': 'Internationalization', 'description': 'Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1153'}, {'title': 'Sandbox / Test Environments', 'description': 'Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': "Easy to use and flexible. Many add on applications available. I don't know why anyone would use anything else.", 'What do you dislike?': 'Required move to the lightning platform. Frequently have to re-map imports of leads.', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': "It's the gold standard.", 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': "Day to day CRM with lead, contact, account & opportunity management. Also the core of marketing efforts If it's not in Salesforce it didn't happen!"}

body: {'What do you like best?': 'The ability to make the system fully bespoke was one of the selling points for the customer I was working with.They could add fields, sub fields, make areas appear dependent on other fields and create bespoke results', 'What do you dislike?': "They were sold the system verbally on it's integration with mailchimp but in reality this function wasn't there and the support separated themselves from the sales claims as these were never put in writing", 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'think carefully about what systems you want to integrate and get in writing that this can be done and what the cost is', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'The client wanted to create a good CRM system that would last for years but could be built upon as their business grew.  Because evey part of Sales force was editable they were not forced to work within any constraints'}

Track stages, values, and probabilities of close. Change as needed.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '4844'}, {'title': 'Desktop Integration', 'description': 'Allows users to sync their Email, Calendar and Contact tools with their CRM system.  Includes Microsoft Outlook and Google integration.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '5099'}, {'title': 'Product & Price List Management', 'description': 'Enter product/part numbers and manage the prices associated with them.  Typically functionality allows users to add products and prices to opportunities and quotes if these modules are provided within the same system.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '4339'}, {'title': 'Quote & Order Management', 'description': 'Allows users to create a quote to be provided to a customer that contain at least products, prices and associated discounts.  Order management allows users to process orders that contain products, prices and associated discounts.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '4274'}, {'title': 'Customer Contract Management', 'description': 'Management of contracts made with customers.  Contract management includes negotiating the terms and conditions in contracts and ensuring compliance with the terms and conditions, as well as documenting and agreeing on any changes or amendments that may arise during its implementation or execution.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '4925'}]}, {'category': 'Marketing Automation', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Email Marketing', 'description': 'Allows users to send email to contacts in bulk.  Common features include: Built in Email templates, social media integration, Subscriber list management, sign up forms, success rate reports, AB testing and auto-responders.', 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '4269'}, {'title': 'Campaign Management', 'description': 'Optimizes the process for organizations to develop and deploy multiple-channel marketing campaigns to target groups or individuals and track the effect of those campaigns, by customer segment, over time.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '4570'}, {'title': 'Lead Management', 'description': 'Allows users to manage and track leads though a process.  The lead process typically involves steps such as:  1. Lead Generation, 2. Customer Inquiry, Inquiry Capture, Lead Filtering, Lead Grading, Lead Distribution and Lead Qualification.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '5395'}, {'title': 'Marketing ROI Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of effectiveness of an organizations various marketing activities', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3669'}]}, {'category': 'Customer Support', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Case Management', 'description': 'Tracks issues/help requests reported by customers through the resolution process.', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '4313'}, {'title': 'Customer Support Portal', 'description': 'Provides a convenient way for customers to get answers to inquiries, post service issues, place orders, view order histories, and gain access to other information contained in the knowledge base.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '3973'}, {'title': 'Knowledge Base', 'description': 'Information repository that provides a means for information to be collected, organized, shared, searched and utilized.  Allows customers to get answers to common questions.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4266'}, {'title': 'Call Center Features', 'description': 'Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity.  Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3267'}, {'title': 'Support Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '3632'}]}, {'category': 'Reporting & Analytics', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Reporting', 'description': 'Enables reporting of all data contained within the system.  Typically contains standard reports as well as the ability to create ad-hoc reports.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6200'}, {'title': 'Dashboards', 'description': 'An easy to read, often single page, real-time user interface, showing a graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of an organization’s Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable instantaneous and informed decisions to be made at a glance', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6355'}, {'title': 'Forecasting', 'description': "Enables projection of sales revenue, based on historical sales data, analysis of market surveys and trends, and salespersons' estimates.", 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4982'}]}, {'category': 'Mobile & Social', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Social Collaboration Features', 'description': "Enables multiple users to interact by sharing information to achieve a common goal.  Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone", 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '3465'}, {'title': 'Social Network Integration', 'description': 'Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers.  Allows users to filter what’s important and respond quickly.  Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.', 'percentage': '77%', 'based_on_reviews': '3134'}, {'title': 'Mobile User Support', 'description': 'Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.', 'percentage': '76%', 'based_on_reviews': '3851'}]}, {'category': 'Platform', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Customization', 'description': 'Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1678'}, {'title': 'Workflow Capability', 'description': 'Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1694'}, {'title': 'User, Role, and Access Management', 'description': 'Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.', 'percentage': '85%', 'based_on_reviews': '1691'}, {'title': 'Internationalization', 'description': 'Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1153'}, {'title': 'Sandbox / Test Environments', 'description': 'Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

Allows customers to get answers to common questions.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4266'}, {'title': 'Call Center Features', 'description': 'Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity.  Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3267'}, {'title': 'Support Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '3632'}]}, {'category': 'Reporting & Analytics', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Reporting', 'description': 'Enables reporting of all data contained within the system.  Typically contains standard reports as well as the ability to create ad-hoc reports.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6200'}, {'title': 'Dashboards', 'description': 'An easy to read, often single page, real-time user interface, showing a graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of an organization’s Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable instantaneous and informed decisions to be made at a glance', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6355'}, {'title': 'Forecasting', 'description': "Enables projection of sales revenue, based on historical sales data, analysis of market surveys and trends, and salespersons' estimates.", 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4982'}]}, {'category': 'Mobile & Social', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Social Collaboration Features', 'description': "Enables multiple users to interact by sharing information to achieve a common goal.  Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone", 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '3465'}, {'title': 'Social Network Integration', 'description': 'Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers.  Allows users to filter what’s important and respond quickly.  Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.', 'percentage': '77%', 'based_on_reviews': '3134'}, {'title': 'Mobile User Support', 'description': 'Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.', 'percentage': '76%', 'based_on_reviews': '3851'}]}, {'category': 'Platform', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Customization', 'description': 'Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1678'}, {'title': 'Workflow Capability', 'description': 'Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1694'}, {'title': 'User, Role, and Access Management', 'description': 'Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.', 'percentage': '85%', 'based_on_reviews': '1691'}, {'title': 'Internationalization', 'description': 'Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1153'}, {'title': 'Sandbox / Test Environments', 'description': 'Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': 'É um mecanismo de gerenciamento de relacionamento com o cliente, que nos contribui com uma agenda para marcar compromissos e acompanhar as atividades comerciais. Esse software solicita o conhecimento das necessidades e gostos individuais de cada cliente, a fim de facilitar a sincronização de uma agenda de contatos associados às suas contas comerciais, pois é a matéria-prima com a qual o SalesForce CRM trabalha. É altamente recomendável usá-lo ousa e você verá como melhorará suas vendas 100%', 'What do you dislike?': 'O que cria repulsa por este software é que você deve ter Internet, além de dados, que podem se tornar rapidamente objetos se os funcionários não usarem o sistema corretamente.', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'O Salesforce CRM facilita para os usuários agilizar os compromissos de uma empresa. Esse software solicita que saibamos as necessidades e gostos individuais de cada cliente,', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'É uma ferramenta que permite aumentar o crescimento da sua empresa e é a melhor maneira de lidar com o CRM de vendas a 100%. E permite que você tenha contato direto com seus clientes e tenha informações de suas avaliações rapidamente'}

body: {'What do you like best?': 'The best thing i like about this tool is  that to create a application or page for a customer is so easy that you just have to drag and drop the elements they have built all the things you need you just need to understand how to use it. best thing that i liked is intrigation of cloud in this tool. the report wirting the formula making the interaction of the tool with the user is on another level.', 'What do you dislike?': 'It is very big tool so understanding and learning process migth take some time but it is worth it. other than that i dont dislike anything about this product', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'The salesforce is one ofe the most used customer relationship management tool. it has used the technology in most simple and elegent manner to do some complex work that all needs of a company can be fulfilled using this tool. nothing to worry about anything you can keep track of each and every process every transaction every order and more.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'The purpose of doing business effortlessely is the main and most important thing we are trying to do with this software. From creating the customer to making seprate environment for his vendors and for his customer the flow of business on this level can be understand by such an easy way that anyone do it. their is company who manufacture car but they buy some parts of the cars from other company to keep track of orders and the differnt vendors and to keep track of customers of that company and finance and marketing and sales and all are covered under this salesforce.'}

desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:

body: {'What do you like best?': "Love this product, it shows us exactly what is being done as far as how much we are bringing in as revenue and who is bringing it in. It also shows the leader of bringing in the most revenue. It's a great competition tool.", 'What do you dislike?': "I think Salesforce is helpful in showing us how much revenue is being brought into the company and creates great competition on the leader board, I can't think of any downsides using this product.", 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': "Solving problems are who needs to create more revenue as the team goes on sales calls, and the benefits helps us see who is bringing in the most revenue and it's a friendly competition."}

Order management allows users to process orders that contain products, prices and associated discounts.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '4274'}, {'title': 'Customer Contract Management', 'description': 'Management of contracts made with customers.  Contract management includes negotiating the terms and conditions in contracts and ensuring compliance with the terms and conditions, as well as documenting and agreeing on any changes or amendments that may arise during its implementation or execution.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '4925'}]}, {'category': 'Marketing Automation', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Email Marketing', 'description': 'Allows users to send email to contacts in bulk.  Common features include: Built in Email templates, social media integration, Subscriber list management, sign up forms, success rate reports, AB testing and auto-responders.', 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '4269'}, {'title': 'Campaign Management', 'description': 'Optimizes the process for organizations to develop and deploy multiple-channel marketing campaigns to target groups or individuals and track the effect of those campaigns, by customer segment, over time.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '4570'}, {'title': 'Lead Management', 'description': 'Allows users to manage and track leads though a process.  The lead process typically involves steps such as:  1. Lead Generation, 2. Customer Inquiry, Inquiry Capture, Lead Filtering, Lead Grading, Lead Distribution and Lead Qualification.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '5395'}, {'title': 'Marketing ROI Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of effectiveness of an organizations various marketing activities', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3669'}]}, {'category': 'Customer Support', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Case Management', 'description': 'Tracks issues/help requests reported by customers through the resolution process.', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '4313'}, {'title': 'Customer Support Portal', 'description': 'Provides a convenient way for customers to get answers to inquiries, post service issues, place orders, view order histories, and gain access to other information contained in the knowledge base.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '3973'}, {'title': 'Knowledge Base', 'description': 'Information repository that provides a means for information to be collected, organized, shared, searched and utilized.  Allows customers to get answers to common questions.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4266'}, {'title': 'Call Center Features', 'description': 'Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity.  Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3267'}, {'title': 'Support Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '3632'}]}, {'category': 'Reporting & Analytics', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Reporting', 'description': 'Enables reporting of all data contained within the system.  Typically contains standard reports as well as the ability to create ad-hoc reports.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6200'}, {'title': 'Dashboards', 'description': 'An easy to read, often single page, real-time user interface, showing a graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of an organization’s Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable instantaneous and informed decisions to be made at a glance', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6355'}, {'title': 'Forecasting', 'description': "Enables projection of sales revenue, based on historical sales data, analysis of market surveys and trends, and salespersons' estimates.", 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4982'}]}, {'category': 'Mobile & Social', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Social Collaboration Features', 'description': "Enables multiple users to interact by sharing information to achieve a common goal.  Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone", 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '3465'}, {'title': 'Social Network Integration', 'description': 'Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers.  Allows users to filter what’s important and respond quickly.  Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.', 'percentage': '77%', 'based_on_reviews': '3134'}, {'title': 'Mobile User Support', 'description': 'Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.', 'percentage': '76%', 'based_on_reviews': '3851'}]}, {'category': 'Platform', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Customization', 'description': 'Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1678'}, {'title': 'Workflow Capability', 'description': 'Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1694'}, {'title': 'User, Role, and Access Management', 'description': 'Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.', 'percentage': '85%', 'based_on_reviews': '1691'}, {'title': 'Internationalization', 'description': 'Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1153'}, {'title': 'Sandbox / Test Environments', 'description': 'Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product? body: {'What do you like best?': 'It is very user friendly and serves my purpose of CRM. Plus can have n number of integrations.', 'What do you dislike?': 'nothing to be disliked as the CRM is beautifully designed for user friendliness', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'My sales team is on a single platform to approach deals and it helps them perform better. The major benefits are that all deals are separately aligned and no agents can work on each others deals.'}

body: {'What do you like best?': 'Arrange all personal information readily in one region and review all customer-related information. It takes time to create your system, perseverance and full-time administrators/developers\xa0are needed to regulate the market the way you want', 'What do you dislike?': "It's all a premium service. It's an additional charge if you want a build-on, that can sometimes add up very fast. After starting a new business, time commitment for admins as everything is personalised", 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'Salesforce has enabled us to preserve a closer relationship to our current customers, increasing our faithfulness to our corporation and helping us to optimise the duties and priorities with that we were able to attract new customers, as well as enabling us to better organise and cooperate with our employees', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'This implementation is practically some of the best tools my business would have had, as it has enabled me to improve my professional services efficiency in a very efficient manner, enabling me to track my customers activities within and without the platform'}

Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]

The lead process typically involves steps such as:  1. Lead Generation, 2. Customer Inquiry, Inquiry Capture, Lead Filtering, Lead Grading, Lead Distribution and Lead Qualification.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '5395'}, {'title': 'Marketing ROI Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of effectiveness of an organizations various marketing activities', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3669'}]}, {'category': 'Customer Support', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Case Management', 'description': 'Tracks issues/help requests reported by customers through the resolution process.', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '4313'}, {'title': 'Customer Support Portal', 'description': 'Provides a convenient way for customers to get answers to inquiries, post service issues, place orders, view order histories, and gain access to other information contained in the knowledge base.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '3973'}, {'title': 'Knowledge Base', 'description': 'Information repository that provides a means for information to be collected, organized, shared, searched and utilized.  Allows customers to get answers to common questions.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4266'}, {'title': 'Call Center Features', 'description': 'Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity. name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': 'Salesforce CRM makes it super easy to search for contacts by any feature including name, phone number, email, birth date, etc. It is super easy to keep track of both prospects and clients and we love using Salesforce for our sales pipeline.', 'What do you dislike?': 'Everything about Salesforce is great. Our only complaint about the service is the price. Salesforce is relatively expensive, but this is because of the variety of features that are offered through the platform. In addition, the interface is a bit difficult to learn at first because of the amount of possibilities through the platform. Thus, it is a double edged sword.', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'If you have the budget, you should consider using Salesforce. If you do not have the budget, there are other options like Zoho CRM that offer similar capabilities, but none of the other platforms are as extensive as Salesforce.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Keeping track of our sales pipeine.'}

Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1694'}, {'title': 'User, Role, and Access Management', 'description': 'Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.', 'percentage': '85%', 'based_on_reviews': '1691'}, {'title': 'Internationalization', 'description': 'Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1153'}, {'title': 'Sandbox / Test Environments', 'description': 'Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': 'The ability to streamline all of my accounts under on Application. Long gone are the days of jumping back and forth between applications.', 'What do you dislike?': 'There were some initial issues regarding some of the internal accounts, but our rep helped us get past that discord.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Being able to accurately have all my accounts under one application. I am able to keep up with when, where, and what time they were contacted to make sure we are keeping up with their needs.'}

Order management allows users to process orders that contain products, prices and associated discounts.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '4274'}, {'title': 'Customer Contract Management', 'description': 'Management of contracts made with customers.  Contract management includes negotiating the terms and conditions in contracts and ensuring compliance with the terms and conditions, as well as documenting and agreeing on any changes or amendments that may arise during its implementation or execution.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '4925'}]}, {'category': 'Marketing Automation', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Email Marketing', 'description': 'Allows users to send email to contacts in bulk. The lead process typically involves steps such as:  1. Lead Generation, 2. Allows customers to get answers to common questions.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4266'}, {'title': 'Call Center Features', 'description': 'Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity. It creates a general relationship between you and the client. What you have done and what the client has done. Also, Salesforce offers you the first ten licenses for free if you are a non-profit person or company.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'It might not be clear what is an extra. It lacks some functions that you might expect from a system like conditional fields cannot be highlighted.'}

body: {'What do you like best?': 'I enjoy that this software can be integrated with proprietary software and built out / customized for best use. Very multi-functional.', 'What do you dislike?': "There wasn't a downside to using SalesForce.", 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'If you are looking for a CRM that is multi-functional and can be customized to best use for your company than this is the software for you!', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': "Keeping track of KPI's, tracking contacts, reporting data, and prospecting accounts."}

body: {'What do you like best?': 'Lot of customisation available using apex classes and the generation of reports using Einstein is excellent.', 'What do you dislike?': "It's a tad costly for small businesses and affordability kicks in.", 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Entire sales cycle and conversion process can be tracked easily. The community cloud is used for building a custom website.'}

name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': "Salesforce CRM is a ready-to-use solution that is configured in minutes and is designed for growing businesses. It allows us to obtain information and activities of clients in real time in one place, as well as information with panels and reports.\rIt allows us to treat each customer as if he were the only one with Salesforce CRM. Understand their needs, solve the problems they experience and identify the opportunities to provide their help thanks to the management of their clients' information and interactions with their company in a single platform that can be accessed at any time and place.", 'What do you dislike?': 'Price hikes based on the number of users are quite important.', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'With Salesforce you can\rEliminate the need for additional forms of communication, documents, spreadsheets, whatever. This is essential for any sales team, regardless of industry.\rOptimize your sales, services, marketing and much more with a highly valued and highly experienced customer relationship management (CRM) solution in the world.\rIt is multilanguage Spanish, English, Portuguese and others', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': "We have a customer service that kept track of your work through email and spreadsheets, and it didn't work for us. Salesforce Service Cloud allowed us to move all that to the cloud with easy registration and tracking of cases. We were able to integrate with Outlook so that support request emails are automatically registered and assigned to support staff according to the assignment rules we configure. We are responding to work requests and closing cases 47% faster than before and nothing is lost or overlooked because the panels clearly show the status of cases and requests."}

body: {'What do you like best?': 'It makes it easier to convert leads from Marketing into sales leads that we can follow up on. It also makes it more efficient to document sales log around specific leads so that we all know who has been pursued and whether they have converted to a customer or not', 'What do you dislike?': 'Sometimes the interface can be confusing particularly when downloading reports', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'Give yourself time to get familiar with the platform before diving in - make good use of the reports and filters tools to segment your sales leads.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Logs of leads from marketing into converted customers'}

API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': 'The tool gives us sales and intelligent management. There are many features for individually engaging and controlling each customer account. With Salesforce CRM we classify contact based on custom criteria, schedule meetings, and keep the entire database of sales, customers, commissions, profits, losses in one place. Graphical reports help you visualize business.', 'What do you dislike?': 'The management tool is amazing and hardly any teams encountered any kind of problem. Talking to those responsible too, no one has anything negative to add.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': "Management software has helped us in many things, but especially in strengthening our strategic growth,\rincrease our managers' sales productivity and customer confidence in projects due to the correct alignment."}

What benefits have you realized?': 'Coordination between Sales and Marketing Teams.  Worked out great!'}

body: {'What do you like best?': "Salesforce CRM is a great tool that's here to stay in business. The management and optimization power it brings is incredible. Sales have greatly improved due to the fundamental management of this software. All sales, purchases, service, are reported and managed individually and controlled.", 'What do you dislike?': 'The use of this tool is constant and honestly, we had no major problems to report. So we have nothing negative to say about SalesForce CRM. Software has always worked very well in the company.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Salesforce CRM has brought us more peace of mind and management power over our customer accounts and the entire commerce. It is possible to generate complete and accurate reports of sales, service, service and know exactly where we were wrong, where could improve. Salesforce support is great too, and when we need it, it helped us quickly.'}

Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3267'}, {'title': 'Support Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '3632'}]}, {'category': 'Reporting & Analytics', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Reporting', 'description': 'Enables reporting of all data contained within the system. Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.', 'percentage': '77%', 'based_on_reviews': '3134'}, {'title': 'Mobile User Support', 'description': 'Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.', 'percentage': '76%', 'based_on_reviews': '3851'}]}, {'category': 'Platform', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Customization', 'description': 'Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1678'}, {'title': 'Workflow Capability', 'description': 'Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users. Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1694'}, {'title': 'User, Role, and Access Management', 'description': 'Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.', 'percentage': '85%', 'based_on_reviews': '1691'}, {'title': 'Internationalization', 'description': 'Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1153'}, {'title': 'Sandbox / Test Environments', 'description': 'Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': 'Salesforce makes life so much easier for keeping all information in one spot for my candidates.', 'What do you dislike?': 'Every so often there are some slowing within the system.   Almost as if it is in overload mode.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Being able to fill candidates to job orders and also having all documents (resumes) uploaded to their files.'}

I wish I could simply remain signed in on the grounds that that way when I leave for the afternoon and return, it spares time.", 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'I would suggest on the off chance that you have a movement industry organization, for example, Visit Orlando. Keeps you associated with the visitors just as keeps every one of the workers in agreement in regards to every customer.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'not so much tackling any issues. Ready to see the data of our customers all together, it is entirely direct and simple to pursue.'}

desc:

body: {'What do you like best?': "I like that the content is adjustable i can add and customize the view as i need. I also like that it stores so much data in one place, i dont have to search through multiple systems to find what i need-i can view candidates, companies, jobs, all in one place. I also like that this program allows me to search data for the company as a whole, not just the data that i have entered but everyone else's as well; this is nice to have in a sales role where we could have the tendency to overlap in activity.", 'What do you dislike?': 'Nothing to dislike, this is a great tool that i use on a daily basis and enjoy!', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'Just give it a try! This is a great tool that you can customize to your company, job title, needs-it makes it easy to see everything at once and even has advanced reporting built right into it!', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'It is easier to track my productivity with this program-the data is quick to generate and easy to enter; It also helps me to know when to call my customers, stores my previous communication with them and allows me to schedule out future events; i like that i can call directly from this system with a click of the mouse-that is so niCe!'}
