Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': "I'd like the most the search capabilities and the unique view of the customer, with all useful link to go through the account information. I find useful to to have integrated dashboard and alerts. Nice to be able to start some business process from the customer account, even if unfortunately not all the tolls we used are integrated, thus we need to connect to connect to different tool to start a process (for instance ticket submission), related to the customer, or to get a status update on the customer related info.", 'What do you dislike?': 'I don\'t like that the help function related to the product and its not contextualised to the implementation, i.e. the business context, of the customer is asking for help, I\'m not interested\rToo m a ny functionality, not personalised per role to focus on the main topic, poor in helping change management on new employ and sharing best practice on how to utilise the tool to be successful, suggesting the 20/80 of the most important functionality that must be used in the customer business context, thus actually to dispersive, "there is all, there is nothing".    \rPoor integration with outlook and other mass update tool, common used, like spreadsheet.', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'If you are in a pay-as-you-go world, consider alternative, make your own crm and resell it instead of using salesforce', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': "I'm solving the problem to comply to bureaucracy, giving visibility of my activities to my manager. No value added gained by the use of Salesforce."}

Typically functionality allows users to add products and prices to opportunities and quotes if these modules are provided within the same system.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '4339'}, {'title': 'Quote & Order Management', 'description': 'Allows users to create a quote to be provided to a customer that contain at least products, prices and associated discounts.  Order management allows users to process orders that contain products, prices and associated discounts.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '4274'}, {'title': 'Customer Contract Management', 'description': 'Management of contracts made with customers.  Contract management includes negotiating the terms and conditions in contracts and ensuring compliance with the terms and conditions, as well as documenting and agreeing on any changes or amendments that may arise during its implementation or execution.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '4925'}]}, {'category': 'Marketing Automation', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Email Marketing', 'description': 'Allows users to send email to contacts in bulk.  Common features include: Built in Email templates, social media integration, Subscriber list management, sign up forms, success rate reports, AB testing and auto-responders.', 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '4269'}, {'title': 'Campaign Management', 'description': 'Optimizes the process for organizations to develop and deploy multiple-channel marketing campaigns to target groups or individuals and track the effect of those campaigns, by customer segment, over time.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '4570'}, {'title': 'Lead Management', 'description': 'Allows users to manage and track leads though a process.  The lead process typically involves steps such as:  1. Lead Generation, 2. Customer Inquiry, Inquiry Capture, Lead Filtering, Lead Grading, Lead Distribution and Lead Qualification.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '5395'}, {'title': 'Marketing ROI Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of effectiveness of an organizations various marketing activities', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3669'}]}, {'category': 'Customer Support', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Case Management', 'description': 'Tracks issues/help requests reported by customers through the resolution process.', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '4313'}, {'title': 'Customer Support Portal', 'description': 'Provides a convenient way for customers to get answers to inquiries, post service issues, place orders, view order histories, and gain access to other information contained in the knowledge base.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '3973'}, {'title': 'Knowledge Base', 'description': 'Information repository that provides a means for information to be collected, organized, shared, searched and utilized.  Allows customers to get answers to common questions.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4266'}, {'title': 'Call Center Features', 'description': 'Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity.  Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3267'}, {'title': 'Support Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '3632'}]}, {'category': 'Reporting & Analytics', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Reporting', 'description': 'Enables reporting of all data contained within the system.  Typically contains standard reports as well as the ability to create ad-hoc reports.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6200'}, {'title': 'Dashboards', 'description': 'An easy to read, often single page, real-time user interface, showing a graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of an organization’s Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable instantaneous and informed decisions to be made at a glance', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6355'}, {'title': 'Forecasting', 'description': "Enables projection of sales revenue, based on historical sales data, analysis of market surveys and trends, and salespersons' estimates.", 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4982'}]}, {'category': 'Mobile & Social', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Social Collaboration Features', 'description': "Enables multiple users to interact by sharing information to achieve a common goal.  Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone", 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '3465'}, {'title': 'Social Network Integration', 'description': 'Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers.  Allows users to filter what’s important and respond quickly.  Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.', 'percentage': '77%', 'based_on_reviews': '3134'}, {'title': 'Mobile User Support', 'description': 'Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.', 'percentage': '76%', 'based_on_reviews': '3851'}]}, {'category': 'Platform', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Customization', 'description': 'Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1678'}, {'title': 'Workflow Capability', 'description': 'Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1694'}, {'title': 'User, Role, and Access Management', 'description': 'Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.', 'percentage': '85%', 'based_on_reviews': '1691'}, {'title': 'Internationalization', 'description': 'Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1153'}, {'title': 'Sandbox / Test Environments', 'description': 'Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': 'I like how easy it is to access everything and find what exactly you’re looking for without having to go to FAQs', 'What do you dislike?': 'I dislike that sometimes information does not load, or it closes down.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'I work with creditors so it’s beneficial to look like up all financial information on one main screen instead of several different programs.'}

name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation

body: {'What do you like best?': 'For big companies with complex sales processes, Salesforce is the market leader. I like how every record type and report is customizable to tailor it exactly to your organization. I work in a capacity of helping other organizations gain more value out of their CRM.  \r Salesforce has also gotten a lot faster in the last couple years so one can navigate between different objects and reports relatively seamlessly.', 'What do you dislike?': "Too complex for more companies. I haven't seen any company be successful with Salesforce without a dedicated Salesforce expert/administrator. This is why I only recommend SFDC as the main system of record if the company sells many kinds of procucts/services or sales process/cycle requires the use of custom objects.", 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Tracking the growth of revenue for different companies.'}

After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]

 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': "Salesforce CRM helps us organize our customer database, it is easy to use, with a great and professional interface, it is also the most powerful CRM software we know. With Salesforce CRM I can track, locate and keep every customer in sight very well segmented to achieve large amounts of sales with your marketing activity in a very short time, it's just great", 'What do you dislike?': 'The only disadvantage that I see from the implementation of Salesforce CRM is its great cost, however for all the benefits it offers, it is worth the investment. I think it would be ideal to lower acquisition prices a little to increase the interest of new novice customers', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'We recommend giving you the opportunity to pay access to Saleforce CRM if you want to take your sales beyond what you have been doing, given that when you get your membership, very important options are enabled that cannot be used with the free trial', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Process all the data of our consumers in order to automate our sales processes while still providing quality service to our customers. In addition, serve them as they deserve as quickly as possible to meet their needs in a timely manner, thanks to Salesforce CRM we have scaled this to another higher level'}

Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone", 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '3465'}, {'title': 'Social Network Integration', 'description': 'Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers.  Allows users to filter what’s important and respond quickly.  Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.', 'percentage': '77%', 'based_on_reviews': '3134'}, {'title': 'Mobile User Support', 'description': 'Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.', 'percentage': '76%', 'based_on_reviews': '3851'}]}, {'category': 'Platform', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Customization', 'description': 'Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1678'}, {'title': 'Workflow Capability', 'description': 'Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1694'}, {'title': 'User, Role, and Access Management', 'description': 'Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.', 'percentage': '85%', 'based_on_reviews': '1691'}, {'title': 'Internationalization', 'description': 'Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1153'}, {'title': 'Sandbox / Test Environments', 'description': 'Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]

body: {'What do you like best?': 'Salesforce CRM provides you the best customer relationship management. It provide you custom reports which help you in business analytics. It is perfect for sales team and it keeps track of all sales information that is related for you. It is well integrated and provides you top level of customer supports. It also manages our social media accounts. It provides you email marketing and Facebook posting as well. It enables you to segment large amount of data of user.', 'What do you dislike?': 'It can be hacked easily if you have large data set will take a lot of time. It is not consistent and there is no notification of knowing is your query has finished or not. Random items can easily be shared. It is costly. It is very expensive for small business and will need investment on training as well and it is time consuming in learning as well.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Salesforce is best for email automation and provides us best marketing. It provides us pre schedule communication internal communications as well. We can communicate with your employees with the help of it. It provides me all history of reporting and track its data. It also provides you analytics. It enable me a great feature of ghostwriting like ability of sending email by someone else.'}

body: {'What do you like best?': 'alesForce helps a lot so that the business management where the program is applied is developed in the best way. With this program you can make a unique and organized location for everything. It is also easy to make, in the same way, personal notes on potential customers while also tracking potential profits. Moreover, it is quite customizable. By doing the proper administration you can configure SalesForce to collect, display and track what your team needs to know, with personalized levels of visibility and secure access.', 'What do you dislike?': 'It has a user support that is below the demands of the platform. It must be reminded that the platform is somewhat complex and doubts frequently arise about its operation. But the SalesForce team does not adequately address this group of concerns, which generates delays in the decisions to be made during a management process. They take too long to take care of a case and remain restless for a long time. It is something that must be improved to bring the platform successfully.', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': ' SalesForce is a CRM that you will find very versatile, for all types of management that want to apply in your company. This wide versatility allows SalesForce to be used by all the internal departments of a company. In fact, in our company we were able to apply it successfully in the sales, case management, finance, general administration, marketing and data departments. In all these cases there was a good result and the respective work teams carried out their work in a coordinated manner and meeting the planned goals.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'The solutions you have given me have to do with SalesForce being an all-inclusive CRM. That is, it covers all the details that must be taken into account to keep track of data, such as customer information, sales statistics, commissions, important dates, insurance company data and others of interest. SalesForce customization options also extend to the fact that fields can be customized to track all the information needed for the plan. SalesForce shines for its extensive capabilities.'}

Includes Microsoft Outlook and Google integration.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '5099'}, {'title': 'Product & Price List Management', 'description': 'Enter product/part numbers and manage the prices associated with them.  Typically functionality allows users to add products and prices to opportunities and quotes if these modules are provided within the same system.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '4339'}, {'title': 'Quote & Order Management', 'description': 'Allows users to create a quote to be provided to a customer that contain at least products, prices and associated discounts.  Order management allows users to process orders that contain products, prices and associated discounts.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '4274'}, {'title': 'Customer Contract Management', 'description': 'Management of contracts made with customers.  Contract management includes negotiating the terms and conditions in contracts and ensuring compliance with the terms and conditions, as well as documenting and agreeing on any changes or amendments that may arise during its implementation or execution.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '4925'}]}, {'category': 'Marketing Automation', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Email Marketing', 'description': 'Allows users to send email to contacts in bulk.  Common features include: Built in Email templates, social media integration, Subscriber list management, sign up forms, success rate reports, AB testing and auto-responders.', 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '4269'}, {'title': 'Campaign Management', 'description': 'Optimizes the process for organizations to develop and deploy multiple-channel marketing campaigns to target groups or individuals and track the effect of those campaigns, by customer segment, over time.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '4570'}, {'title': 'Lead Management', 'description': 'Allows users to manage and track leads though a process.  The lead process typically involves steps such as:  1. Lead Generation, 2. Customer Inquiry, Inquiry Capture, Lead Filtering, Lead Grading, Lead Distribution and Lead Qualification.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '5395'}, {'title': 'Marketing ROI Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of effectiveness of an organizations various marketing activities', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3669'}]}, {'category': 'Customer Support', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Case Management', 'description': 'Tracks issues/help requests reported by customers through the resolution process.', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '4313'}, {'title': 'Customer Support Portal', 'description': 'Provides a convenient way for customers to get answers to inquiries, post service issues, place orders, view order histories, and gain access to other information contained in the knowledge base.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '3973'}, {'title': 'Knowledge Base', 'description': 'Information repository that provides a means for information to be collected, organized, shared, searched and utilized.  Allows customers to get answers to common questions.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4266'}, {'title': 'Call Center Features', 'description': 'Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity.  Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3267'}, {'title': 'Support Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '3632'}]}, {'category': 'Reporting & Analytics', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Reporting', 'description': 'Enables reporting of all data contained within the system.  Typically contains standard reports as well as the ability to create ad-hoc reports.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6200'}, {'title': 'Dashboards', 'description': 'An easy to read, often single page, real-time user interface, showing a graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of an organization’s Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable instantaneous and informed decisions to be made at a glance', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6355'}, {'title': 'Forecasting', 'description': "Enables projection of sales revenue, based on historical sales data, analysis of market surveys and trends, and salespersons' estimates.", 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4982'}]}, {'category': 'Mobile & Social', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Social Collaboration Features', 'description': "Enables multiple users to interact by sharing information to achieve a common goal.  Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone", 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '3465'}, {'title': 'Social Network Integration', 'description': 'Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers.  Allows users to filter what’s important and respond quickly.  Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.', 'percentage': '77%', 'based_on_reviews': '3134'}, {'title': 'Mobile User Support', 'description': 'Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.', 'percentage': '76%', 'based_on_reviews': '3851'}]}, {'category': 'Platform', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Customization', 'description': 'Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1678'}, {'title': 'Workflow Capability', 'description': 'Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1694'}, {'title': 'User, Role, and Access Management', 'description': 'Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.', 'percentage': '85%', 'based_on_reviews': '1691'}, {'title': 'Internationalization', 'description': 'Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1153'}, {'title': 'Sandbox / Test Environments', 'description': 'Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': "It has an integration for every other vendor and tool we use, for marketing, product, sales, customer success, legal, etc. It's comprehensive.", 'What do you dislike?': "It is very time consuming and takes an expert to really customize the platform. Once it is customized though, it's fantastic to have something perfectly suited to how you do business.", 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'I use it to track marketing efforts -- where have we reached customers during all of our outbound marketing efforts. Use this to understand what is working best.'}

name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': 'Easy to learn platform that is easy to navigate and cuustomizable to your unique needs. I love the reports that you are able to run and the visuals that are provided on the platform. Data is easy to read and easy to keep track of, allowing you to do your work efficiently - not spending time looking for information because it is readily accessible. Appreciate the email automations and ability to save templates (and share them with your team)', 'What do you dislike?': 'There are a few things that I log in Salesforce that I feel like I am having to duplicate. Certain aspects could be automated to reduce inefficiency. For example, I have to change the status of an individual in two places vs. just one.', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': "Customize it to your company's unique needs - there are endless ways to do this and make it the most efficient for your company.", 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Keeping track of candidates and prospects as far as where they are at in the outreach and interview process. Able to run reports and show visuals for reject reasons, etc.'}

desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:

body: {'What do you like best?': "I like how easy it is to search within SFDC.  It doesn't make you have a full city or person's name, so it's convenient if you're searching and aren't sure what state or province a city is in.", 'What do you dislike?': "There seem to be a lot of errors that fall within saving/etc.  I wish it didn't make you re-type everything when you're trying to save something in a lead/contact and someone else did something while you were editing it.", 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'We are able to accurately track calls, emails, and activities within CRM.  We can build reports and contracts at the touch of a button, while still maintaining professionalism.'}

Provide a partner portal to collaborate with channels on sales opportunities and to share product, pricing, quoting, ordering, and training information', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '4056'}, {'title': 'Opportunity & Pipeline Mgmt.', 'description': 'Manage sales opportunities through their lifecycle from lead to order. Track stages, values, and probabilities of close.  Manage sales pipelines by individual sales rep, team, region, and company-wide.', 'percentage': '86%', 'based_on_reviews': '6369'}, {'title': 'Task / Activity Management', 'description': 'Manage and track tasks and activities.  Assign due dates and integrate to calendars to manage daily schedules and priorities.', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '6620'}, {'title': 'Territory & Quota Management', 'description': 'Assign and manage sales quotas and territories.  Track progress against quotas.  Change as needed.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '4844'}, {'title': 'Desktop Integration', 'description': 'Allows users to sync their Email, Calendar and Contact tools with their CRM system.  Includes Microsoft Outlook and Google integration.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '5099'}, {'title': 'Product & Price List Management', 'description': 'Enter product/part numbers and manage the prices associated with them.  Typically functionality allows users to add products and prices to opportunities and quotes if these modules are provided within the same system.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '4339'}, {'title': 'Quote & Order Management', 'description': 'Allows users to create a quote to be provided to a customer that contain at least products, prices and associated discounts.  Order management allows users to process orders that contain products, prices and associated discounts.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '4274'}, {'title': 'Customer Contract Management', 'description': 'Management of contracts made with customers.  Contract management includes negotiating the terms and conditions in contracts and ensuring compliance with the terms and conditions, as well as documenting and agreeing on any changes or amendments that may arise during its implementation or execution.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '4925'}]}, {'category': 'Marketing Automation', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Email Marketing', 'description': 'Allows users to send email to contacts in bulk.  Common features include: Built in Email templates, social media integration, Subscriber list management, sign up forms, success rate reports, AB testing and auto-responders.', 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '4269'}, {'title': 'Campaign Management', 'description': 'Optimizes the process for organizations to develop and deploy multiple-channel marketing campaigns to target groups or individuals and track the effect of those campaigns, by customer segment, over time.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '4570'}, {'title': 'Lead Management', 'description': 'Allows users to manage and track leads though a process.  The lead process typically involves steps such as:  1. Lead Generation, 2. Customer Inquiry, Inquiry Capture, Lead Filtering, Lead Grading, Lead Distribution and Lead Qualification.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '5395'}, {'title': 'Marketing ROI Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of effectiveness of an organizations various marketing activities', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3669'}]}, {'category': 'Customer Support', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Case Management', 'description': 'Tracks issues/help requests reported by customers through the resolution process.', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '4313'}, {'title': 'Customer Support Portal', 'description': 'Provides a convenient way for customers to get answers to inquiries, post service issues, place orders, view order histories, and gain access to other information contained in the knowledge base.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '3973'}, {'title': 'Knowledge Base', 'description': 'Information repository that provides a means for information to be collected, organized, shared, searched and utilized.  Allows customers to get answers to common questions.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4266'}, {'title': 'Call Center Features', 'description': 'Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity.  Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3267'}, {'title': 'Support Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '3632'}]}, {'category': 'Reporting & Analytics', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Reporting', 'description': 'Enables reporting of all data contained within the system.  Typically contains standard reports as well as the ability to create ad-hoc reports.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6200'}, {'title': 'Dashboards', 'description': 'An easy to read, often single page, real-time user interface, showing a graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of an organization’s Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable instantaneous and informed decisions to be made at a glance', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6355'}, {'title': 'Forecasting', 'description': "Enables projection of sales revenue, based on historical sales data, analysis of market surveys and trends, and salespersons' estimates.", 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4982'}]}, {'category': 'Mobile & Social', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Social Collaboration Features', 'description': "Enables multiple users to interact by sharing information to achieve a common goal.  Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone", 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '3465'}, {'title': 'Social Network Integration', 'description': 'Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers.  Allows users to filter what’s important and respond quickly.  Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.', 'percentage': '77%', 'based_on_reviews': '3134'}, {'title': 'Mobile User Support', 'description': 'Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.', 'percentage': '76%', 'based_on_reviews': '3851'}]}, {'category': 'Platform', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Customization', 'description': 'Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1678'}, {'title': 'Workflow Capability', 'description': 'Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1694'}, {'title': 'User, Role, and Access Management', 'description': 'Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.', 'percentage': '85%', 'based_on_reviews': '1691'}, {'title': 'Internationalization', 'description': 'Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '1153'}, {'title': 'Sandbox / Test Environments', 'description': 'Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]

body: {'What do you like best?': 'SalesForce is a way to work more friendly when handling an important group of customers. As we well know, in the competitive world of business and marketing, recruitment and, above all, maintaining a good relationship with them is essential in a commercial activity. But nowadays that type of work escapes from the hand in occasions and makes support an additional help, of management in this case. This is how I see SalesForce, that support in customer management that has made my job easier.', 'What do you dislike?': 'SalesForce is a great help and support, but basically it requires a great investment, and that in business is no longer attractive. It is a medium-term project, in which you have to wait for the response of the clients to know if that great expense had a return. You can take the matter calmly, but if you do not have the resources at hand, if the situation in your business or company is precarious SalesForce could be what you did not expect. Yes, SalesForce is beneficial but money goes with that benefit. You have to invest and wait.', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'With the use of SalesForce I can say that with this resource you can make a management of the flow of customers more efficiently and that is what is expected when using an additional tool. You want to make the job easier. Performance is expected to maintain good customer relationships. SalesForce is a very complete and versatile system. In it you have all the necessary tools so that we really do the dedicated customer management we want to do. Actually, customer relationship management becomes lighter. There are many customers who manage to attract and retain themselves, for the good of the business and peace of mind of the work team.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'SalesForce does a little more than with a traditional Customer Relationship Management program. I say this because SalesForce goes further so that we can build, maintain and above all manage our relationships with customers. In this way we can do we can treat them individually. Knowing customer needs is even more possible with SalesForce. It is valuable information for any business. Entrepreneurs must focus on that so that there is better business growth. But help is needed and a CRM like SalesForce is there to help you.'}

(PRM)', 'description': 'Manage partners by tracking channel partner leads and sales opportunities.   Provide a partner portal to collaborate with channels on sales opportunities and to share product, pricing, quoting, ordering, and training information', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '4056'}, {'title': 'Opportunity & Pipeline Mgmt.', 'description': 'Manage sales opportunities through their lifecycle from lead to order. Track stages, values, and probabilities of close.  Manage sales pipelines by individual sales rep, team, region, and company-wide.', 'percentage': '86%', 'based_on_reviews': '6369'}, {'title': 'Task / Activity Management', 'description': 'Manage and track tasks and activities.  Assign due dates and integrate to calendars to manage daily schedules and priorities.', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '6620'}, {'title': 'Territory & Quota Management', 'description': 'Assign and manage sales quotas and territories.  Track progress against quotas.  Change as needed.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '4844'}, {'title': 'Desktop Integration', 'description': 'Allows users to sync their Email, Calendar and Contact tools with their CRM system.  Includes Microsoft Outlook and Google integration.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '5099'}, {'title': 'Product & Price List Management', 'description': 'Enter product/part numbers and manage the prices associated with them.  Typically functionality allows users to add products and prices to opportunities and quotes if these modules are provided within the same system.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '4339'}, {'title': 'Quote & Order Management', 'description': 'Allows users to create a quote to be provided to a customer that contain at least products, prices and associated discounts.  Order management allows users to process orders that contain products, prices and associated discounts.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '4274'}, {'title': 'Customer Contract Management', 'description': 'Management of contracts made with customers.  Contract management includes negotiating the terms and conditions in contracts and ensuring compliance with the terms and conditions, as well as documenting and agreeing on any changes or amendments that may arise during its implementation or execution.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '4925'}]}, {'category': 'Marketing Automation', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Email Marketing', 'description': 'Allows users to send email to contacts in bulk.  Common features include: Built in Email templates, social media integration, Subscriber list management, sign up forms, success rate reports, AB testing and auto-responders.', 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '4269'}, {'title': 'Campaign Management', 'description': 'Optimizes the process for organizations to develop and deploy multiple-channel marketing campaigns to target groups or individuals and track the effect of those campaigns, by customer segment, over time.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '4570'}, {'title': 'Lead Management', 'description': 'Allows users to manage and track leads though a process.  The lead process typically involves steps such as:  1. Lead Generation, 2. Customer Inquiry, Inquiry Capture, Lead Filtering, Lead Grading, Lead Distribution and Lead Qualification.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '5395'}, {'title': 'Marketing ROI Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of effectiveness of an organizations various marketing activities', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3669'}]}, {'category': 'Customer Support', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Case Management', 'description': 'Tracks issues/help requests reported by customers through the resolution process.', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '4313'}, {'title': 'Customer Support Portal', 'description': 'Provides a convenient way for customers to get answers to inquiries, post service issues, place orders, view order histories, and gain access to other information contained in the knowledge base.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '3973'}, {'title': 'Knowledge Base', 'description': 'Information repository that provides a means for information to be collected, organized, shared, searched and utilized.  Allows customers to get answers to common questions.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4266'}, {'title': 'Call Center Features', 'description': 'Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity.  Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3267'}, {'title': 'Support Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '3632'}]}, {'category': 'Reporting & Analytics', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Reporting', 'description': 'Enables reporting of all data contained within the system.  Typically contains standard reports as well as the ability to create ad-hoc reports.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6200'}, {'title': 'Dashboards', 'description': 'An easy to read, often single page, real-time user interface, showing a graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of an organization’s Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable instantaneous and informed decisions to be made at a glance', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6355'}, {'title': 'Forecasting', 'description': "Enables projection of sales revenue, based on historical sales data, analysis of market surveys and trends, and salespersons' estimates.", 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4982'}]}, {'category': 'Mobile & Social', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Social Collaboration Features', 'description': "Enables multiple users to interact by sharing information to achieve a common goal.  Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone", 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '3465'}, {'title': 'Social Network Integration', 'description': 'Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers.  Allows users to filter what’s important and respond quickly.  Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.', 'percentage': '77%', 'based_on_reviews': '3134'}, {'title': 'Mobile User Support', 'description': 'Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.', 'percentage': '76%', 'based_on_reviews': '3851'}]}, {'category': 'Platform', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Customization', 'description': 'Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1678'}, {'title': 'Workflow Capability', 'description': 'Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step. body: {'What do you like best?': 'The ability to customize every aspect of the system.  Salesforce is best of breed and every 3rd party application has an integration it seems.', 'What do you dislike?': 'There are some limitations with certain reporting features.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'Sales adoption of CRM (single source of truth) - every app has a salesforce integration making it easy to log activities within the system without disrupting daily workflow'}

Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': 'Anything your company needs to get out of your CRM can be built on Salesforce - literally anything', 'What do you dislike?': 'It is very easy to customize, which means many people cusotmize without thinking through that design decision which can cause major issues in using the platform'}

(PRM)', 'description': 'Manage partners by tracking channel partner leads and sales opportunities.   Provide a partner portal to collaborate with channels on sales opportunities and to share product, pricing, quoting, ordering, and training information', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '4056'}, {'title': 'Opportunity & Pipeline Mgmt.', 'description': 'Manage sales opportunities through their lifecycle from lead to order. Track stages, values, and probabilities of close.  Manage sales pipelines by individual sales rep, team, region, and company-wide.', 'percentage': '86%', 'based_on_reviews': '6369'}, {'title': 'Task / Activity Management', 'description': 'Manage and track tasks and activities.  Assign due dates and integrate to calendars to manage daily schedules and priorities.', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '6620'}, {'title': 'Territory & Quota Management', 'description': 'Assign and manage sales quotas and territories.  Track progress against quotas.  Change as needed.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '4844'}, {'title': 'Desktop Integration', 'description': 'Allows users to sync their Email, Calendar and Contact tools with their CRM system.  Includes Microsoft Outlook and Google integration.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '5099'}, {'title': 'Product & Price List Management', 'description': 'Enter product/part numbers and manage the prices associated with them.  Typically functionality allows users to add products and prices to opportunities and quotes if these modules are provided within the same system.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '4339'}, {'title': 'Quote & Order Management', 'description': 'Allows users to create a quote to be provided to a customer that contain at least products, prices and associated discounts.  Order management allows users to process orders that contain products, prices and associated discounts.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '4274'}, {'title': 'Customer Contract Management', 'description': 'Management of contracts made with customers.  Contract management includes negotiating the terms and conditions in contracts and ensuring compliance with the terms and conditions, as well as documenting and agreeing on any changes or amendments that may arise during its implementation or execution.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '4925'}]}, {'category': 'Marketing Automation', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Email Marketing', 'description': 'Allows users to send email to contacts in bulk.  Common features include: Built in Email templates, social media integration, Subscriber list management, sign up forms, success rate reports, AB testing and auto-responders.', 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '4269'}, {'title': 'Campaign Management', 'description': 'Optimizes the process for organizations to develop and deploy multiple-channel marketing campaigns to target groups or individuals and track the effect of those campaigns, by customer segment, over time.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '4570'}, {'title': 'Lead Management', 'description': 'Allows users to manage and track leads though a process.  The lead process typically involves steps such as:  1. Lead Generation, 2. Customer Inquiry, Inquiry Capture, Lead Filtering, Lead Grading, Lead Distribution and Lead Qualification.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '5395'}, {'title': 'Marketing ROI Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of effectiveness of an organizations various marketing activities', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3669'}]}, {'category': 'Customer Support', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Case Management', 'description': 'Tracks issues/help requests reported by customers through the resolution process.', 'percentage': '82%', 'based_on_reviews': '4313'}, {'title': 'Customer Support Portal', 'description': 'Provides a convenient way for customers to get answers to inquiries, post service issues, place orders, view order histories, and gain access to other information contained in the knowledge base.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '3973'}, {'title': 'Knowledge Base', 'description': 'Information repository that provides a means for information to be collected, organized, shared, searched and utilized.  Allows customers to get answers to common questions.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4266'}, {'title': 'Call Center Features', 'description': 'Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity.  Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '3267'}, {'title': 'Support Analytics', 'description': 'Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools.', 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '3632'}]}, {'category': 'Reporting & Analytics', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Reporting', 'description': 'Enables reporting of all data contained within the system.  Typically contains standard reports as well as the ability to create ad-hoc reports.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6200'}, {'title': 'Dashboards', 'description': 'An easy to read, often single page, real-time user interface, showing a graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of an organization’s Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable instantaneous and informed decisions to be made at a glance', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '6355'}, {'title': 'Forecasting', 'description': "Enables projection of sales revenue, based on historical sales data, analysis of market surveys and trends, and salespersons' estimates.", 'percentage': '81%', 'based_on_reviews': '4982'}]}, {'category': 'Mobile & Social', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Social Collaboration Features', 'description': "Enables multiple users to interact by sharing information to achieve a common goal.  Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone", 'percentage': '78%', 'based_on_reviews': '3465'}, {'title': 'Social Network Integration', 'description': 'Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers. Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1678'}, {'title': 'Workflow Capability', 'description': 'Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users. body: {'What do you like best?': 'The case console, how easily is to have a ticketing system in which also you can implement surveys, have statistics, templates, internal communication, I love post function tool, it is really great.', 'What do you dislike?': 'That we have to wait for so long if our team wants to do some changes.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'We are using this tool to solve all the queries around the globe for our internal and external stakeholders. it allows a better understanding on how well or bad we are performing and it can be reflected in our reports.'}

body: {'What do you like best?': "It's absolutely the more customizable CRM, you can completely adapt it to your business and processes, automate a lot of stuffs, ...", 'What do you dislike?': "It's not user-friendly, it's very difficult to have a clear vision of the information, although you can adapt it to your preferences it is not simple and clean or intuitive.", 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': "If your business is very specific and doesn't fit on the generic CRM's, this is a great CRM because you are able to fully adapt it to your needs and requirements."}

After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.', 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1352'}, {'title': 'Document & Content Mgmt.', 'description': 'Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.', 'percentage': '79%', 'based_on_reviews': '1408'}, {'title': 'Performance and Reliability', 'description': 'Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1670'}, {'title': 'Output Document Generation', 'description': 'Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.', 'percentage': '80%', 'based_on_reviews': '1237'}]}, {'category': 'Integration', 'feature_list': [{'title': 'Data Import & Export Tools', 'description': 'Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.', 'percentage': '83%', 'based_on_reviews': '750'}, {'title': 'Integration APIs', 'description': "Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.", 'percentage': '84%', 'based_on_reviews': '1253'}, {'title': 'Breadth of Partner Applications', 'description': 'To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.', 'percentage': '87%', 'based_on_reviews': '1223'}]}]
name: Salesforce CRM
desc:
Salesforce helps businesses of all sizes accelerate sales, automate tasks and make smarter decisions so you can grow your business faster. Salesforce CRM offers:
 - Lead & Contact Management
 - Sales Opportunity Management
 - Workflow Rules & Automation
 - Customizable Reports & Dashboards
 - Mobile Application

body: {'What do you like best?': 'Salesforce is a great application and tool to track customer relationships between different business units.', 'What do you dislike?': 'Sometimes there is too many pages I need to navigate to get to the information I need.', 'Recommendations to others considering the product': 'Highly recommend salesforce', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'The ability to track our customers status and information across the enterprise through one source.'}

body: {'What do you like best?': "Salesforce is very good as a CRM regardless of what industry you're in.  I really like the activity reminders you can set up.", 'What do you dislike?': 'I dislike like that when you schedule an appointment or Event, that event auto closes at the time you schedule it so often times I will forget to add an additional task to follow up with that contact.', 'What problems are you solving with the product?  What benefits have you realized?': 'I am able to track activities very effectively which allows me to contact the people when I need to rather than forgetting about them.'}
